this game took me by surprise its a beautifully written mystery with strong 90s vibes and a badass protagonist kathy is smart sarcastic and layered  and her journey through family secrets and personal trauma is engaging from start to finish  the puzzles are logical and satisfying and the pixel art and music really set the mood if you liked broken sword or the longest journey this is a mustplay  rating 910  a gripping detective story with heart
an engaging oldschool point n click adventure with well though out and logical puzzles and a story that will keep moving you forward even had a few loughout loud moments
